dialog.speaker: graham_bryant (Male)
dialog.utterance: Captain! You must be back with the access codes to our new ship.

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: Graham. We need to talk.

dialog.speaker: graham_bryant (Male)
dialog.utterance: We have work to do. This isn't the time for one of our spats.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'm sorry, Graham, but... Zora's taking over.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Stand down, Graham.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: We aren't here to argue. We're here to act.

dialog.speaker: graham_bryant (Male)
dialog.utterance: What? ...Zora?

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: You're running the Iconoclasts into the ground, and I don't believe it'll get better after we take Stellar Bay.

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: The troops take orders from me already. And you've... you've brought me as far as you can down the Eternal path. It's time to step down.

dialog.speaker: graham_bryant (Male)
dialog.utterance: The troops. Listen to you. This isn't an army. They aren't soldiers. They're believers. Followers. They pick up a gun because you tell them to, not because they want to.

dialog.speaker: graham_bryant (Male)
dialog.utterance: And you, Captain. After all you've done for me. For us. You throw behind this mutinous blasphemer?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I do. She's got the best interests of the Iconoclasts at heart.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You're about to take over a planet. You can't handle that responsibility.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I just think she'll be a better leader.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Let's get on with it, Zora.

dialog.speaker: graham_bryant (Male)
dialog.utterance: I built this movement from the ground up. I've brought freedom to Monarch, and all these years later, we're still free.

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: I joined because I believed that you were in it for the Iconoclasts. That you wanted nothing more than to bring freedom to Halcyon. That you were selfless.

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: But... I know the truth now, Graham. I know what happened in Amber Heights. You didn't start this movement because you wanted to save us. You wanted to save yourself.

dialog.speaker: graham_bryant (Male)
dialog.utterance: No...

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Those deaths are on your hands, Graham. No amount of meditating will clean them.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You ran. You needed a clear conscience, so you ran.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You don't seek enlightenment. You just feel guilty.

dialog.speaker: graham_bryant (Male)
dialog.utterance: I've spent years atoning for my sins! I've studied. Meditated. Taught. I built the Iconoclasts so that any man could cast away his past for a fresh start.

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: That's your answer, Graham? You... needed a fresh start? After all those innocent lives...

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: I'm sorry. I believed in you once. I did. But... it's over. Stand down.

dialog.speaker: graham_bryant (Male)
dialog.utterance: I won't. What happened back then was a mistake, and the colony has moved on. This is my movement. These are my people. If you want to lead them, you'll have to kill me.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: That isn't necessary.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Not much of a choice here, Zora.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Let's get this over with.

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: Please... don't make me do this, Graham.

dialog.speaker: graham_bryant (Male)
dialog.utterance: If this is where my path ends, I accept it. But as long as I draw breath, I will not abandon them.

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: So be it.

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: Yeah. I... I had hoped.

dialog.speaker: graham_bryant (Male)
dialog.utterance: I escaped the corruption of the endless cycle of corporate greed. Yes, I ran from that. But now I'm ready to face it once more!

dialog.speaker: graham_bryant (Male)
dialog.utterance: Guilty? I didn't mean for them to die. I'm not a monster. Of course I feel fucking guilty!

dialog.speaker: graham_bryant (Male)
dialog.utterance: I can and shall. All I've done, I've done for my people, and look at where that path has led me.

dialog.speaker: graham_bryant (Male)
dialog.utterance: How can you say that after all I've done for the Iconoclasts? They wouldn't be here without me.

dialog.speaker: Zora (Female)
dialog.utterance: Yeah. I... yeah. Let's.

dialog.speaker: graham_bryant (Male)
dialog.utterance: Stand... down? I'm afraid I don't understand, Captain.

dialog.speaker: graham_bryant (Male)
dialog.utterance: Yes. We are acting. On Stellar Bay. What's this about?
